finalProject

Class CreditCardInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • finalProject.Issuer
      • finalProject.CreditCardInfo

  • public class CreditCardInfo
extends Issuer
    CreditCardInfo class is an subclass of Issuer class. CreditCardInfo contains methods that stores and return a credit card number(a string) and provides methods to validate a credit card number
    Version:
    05/06/2017
    Author:
    nguyen

      • isValidCreditCardNumber

        public boolean isValidCreditCardNumber()
                                throws NotCreditCardNumberFormat
        This method will validate cardNumberStr to determine cardNumberStr is a valid credit card number or not
        Returns:
        true if cardNumberStr is a valid credit card number, if not return false
        Throws:
        NotCreditCardNumberFormat - ^If String object referenced by cardNumberStr contains a non numeric character.
